content.title: Jive Upgrade
content.layoutDescription: Document layout with text and tables
content.visibleText:
Jive Upgrade

Slot #2

Customer engagement/rollout - BA2: IgniteTech : Jive - Jive AI Copilot

Progress Week 22
- Switched our strategy to reach out to all Cloud customers (write-up) and contacted 90 users at 84 companies in an attempt to enlarge our pool of customers we can work with:
 - Aside from the standard contacts, we also include all users who have been active on Zendesk (list)
- Create How-to-Summarize videos designed to get customer attention: Get Answers with Copilot
- Written Handbooks to share with Libro, CC, and P2S, so they can start asking questions instead of keywords.
- A total of 134 usages happened between 27.05-31.05
 - Libro: 106 usages / CC: 25 usages
 - Down-votes: 3 / Up-votes: 2

Metrics/KPIs

Outreach efforts

Segment 1 (Initial Interest)
Segment 2 (Compliance)
Segment 3 (High ARR, Avg. Use)

Customers in segment

Reached
- Interested
- Declined

Enabled

content.title: Jive Upgrade
content.visibleText:
Slot #2

Customer engagement/rollout - BA2: IgniteTech : Jive - Jive AI Copilot

Progress Week 22
- Switched our strategy to reach out to all Cloud customers (write-up) and contacted 90 users at 84 companies in an attempt to enlarge our pool of customers we can work with:
 - Aside from the standard contacts, we also include all users who have been active on Zendesk (list)
- Create How-to-Summarize videos designed to get customer attention: Get Answers with Copilot
- Created a handbook with valuable customer use-cases and examples, educating customers on how to properly use the L - shared with Libro, CCF, and P25, so they can start asking questions instead of keywords.
- A total of 1340 uses happened between 27-05-31.05
 - Libro: 106 usages / CCF: 23 usages
 - Down-votes: 3 / Up-votes: 22

content.title: Jive Upgrade
content.visibleText:
Progress Week 22
Switched our strategy to reach out to all Cloud customers (write-up) and contacted 90 users at 84 companies in an attempt to enlarge our pool of customers we can work with:
Aside from the standard contacts, we also include all users who have been active on Zendesk (list)
Create two how-to videos designed to get customer attention: Get Answers with Copilot and How-to-Summarize
Created a handbook with valuable customer use-cases and examples, educating customers on how to properly use the Copilot - shared with Libro, CCF, and P25
There were 134 conversations between 27-05 and 31-05
Libro: 106 and CCF: 23, with 3 down-votes and 2 up-votes.
